microagent.actuator

Class CarMover

  • java.lang.Object
    • microagent.AbstractMover<Plan>
      • microagent.actuator.CarMover

  • public class CarMover
extends AbstractMover<Plan>
    Car mover is an actuator allowing MicroAgents to move in a simulation by following the current road network.
    Author:
    Simon Pageaud
